title: Vaccines Demystified
author: Laura Perkowski; ND; PA-C
cleaned_text: Laura Perkowski, ND, PA-C Dr. Krumbeck's knowledge base regarding vaccines is impressive. She shares this knowledge with the public in an engaging and informative way in her Webinar Vaccines Demystified. Dr. Erika remains sensitive and neutral throughout the series, encouraging parents and families to make their own informed choices regarding the use of vaccines. Additionally, all of the information presented is supported by published research studies. Citations are available for those who wish to delve deeper into the research. Vaccines Demystified is a great resource for anyone who wishes to understand the history of vaccines, their individual components and side effects, and the impact they have on one particular child and the greater community.
